Sobia Asif

Le cheveux was founded in 2017 by a young student who had a dream of giving everyone good hair for a reasonable price. After doing a lot of learning and research about different hair types, textures and quality, we felt confident to open our business for the world ( well London for now) we know that having long thick hair is a journey many of us do not have time for, hair masks, hair cuts and hair routines all to no avail. A miracle is what everyone wants and we’re here to make that dream a reality.


We also know luscious lashes is something everyone needs in their life to cut down on getting ready in the morning so we decided why not add on this service too. We’re here to give you EXACTLY what you want, when you want!

Get In Contact With Us Now!!!

Get your hair & eyelashes sorted now and enjoy the weekend, we are available at your request.

Professional Hair & Eyelash Extension

Since opening we have grown our clientbase with consistency, loyalty and respect. We hope you join our growing business and experience the quality services we can offer and take a look at the advantages of coming to us below:

Availability

Available 7 days a week (and except on bank holidays)

Mobile

Based in London & able to travel within UK and abroad

Qualified

Qualified and accedited in Hair and Eyelash extension

Affordable Prices

We try to keep our prices low, whilst keeping our quality high

Quality products

Cruelty free, high quality products

Unsociable hours

Our services are available at WHATEVER time suits you!
